Package com.heretere.hdl.relocation

Class Relocator

java.lang.Object
com.heretere.hdl.relocation.Relocator
public final class Relocator
extends Object
This class is used for relocating the packages inside of a downloaded jar.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Relocator​(@NotNull Path basePath)
    Creates a new relocator instance.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void relocate​(@NotNull Collection<@NotNull RelocationInfo> relocations, @NotNull RelocatableDependency dependency)
    Relocates the packages in a jar file based on the specified relocations.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Relocator

      public Relocator​(@NotNull @NotNull Path basePath) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException, NoSuchMethodException, InvocationTargetException, IllegalAccessException
      Creates a new relocator instance.
      Parameters:
      basePath - The base path for relocations.
      Throws:
      IOException - If access was denied for creating files.
      ClassNotFoundException - If the necessary classes weren't found after downloading.
      NoSuchMethodException - If the necessary methods weren't found after downloading.
      InvocationTargetException - If there was an error while relocating the jar files.
      IllegalAccessException - If the relocator was denied access to any of the methods.

  • Method Details

    • relocate

      public void relocate​(@NotNull @NotNull Collection<@NotNull RelocationInfo> relocations, @NotNull @NotNull RelocatableDependency dependency) throws IllegalAccessException, InvocationTargetException, InstantiationException
      Relocates the packages in a jar file based on the specified relocations.
      Parameters:
      relocations - A collection of RelocationInfo used for relocation information.
      dependency - The dependency to relocate.
      Throws:
      IllegalAccessException - If the relocator was denied access to any of the methods.
      InvocationTargetException - If there was an error while relocating the jar files.
      InstantiationException - If there was an error while creating a new relocation instance.
